name: MagnaGarurumon
description: MagnaGarurumon resembles a large, robotic wolf or wolf-like creature. Its body is predominantly silver with blue and red accents, giving it a high-tech appearance. MagnaGarurumon's head is adorned with a large, golden mane-like crest, and it has sharp, angular features, including its eyes. It sports a pair of rocket thrusters on its back.
